title: Event Catering Delivery Coordination
desc_split: A catering company operates from multiple regional kitchens (<loc_depot>) to supply freshly prepared meals to event venues (<loc_customer>). Each venue requires deliveries to arrive precisely within a time window (<time_windows>) to coincide with event start times. Catering trucks have a maximum load capacity (<capacity> kg) for meal boxes, and drivers must return to their origin depot within an 8-hour shift (<duration_limit>). The challenge is to route trucks efficiently to meet all time constraints, avoid overloading vehicles, and minimize total travel distance while ensuring every event receives its order exactly once.
label: mdvrpltw

title: Municipal Waste Collection with Time-Sensitive Routes
desc_split: A city’s sanitation department manages multiple waste collection depots (<loc_depot>) to service residential neighborhoods (<loc_customer>). Each neighborhood has designated collection hours (<time_windows>) based on street-cleaning schedules. Garbage trucks must not exceed their weight capacity (<capacity> tons) and complete all pickups within a 10-hour daily route limit (<duration_limit>). The goal is to design routes from each depot that respect time windows, prevent overloading, and reduce total mileage while ensuring every bin is emptied within its allocated timeframe.
label: mdvrpltw

title: Medical Lab Sample Collection Network
desc_split: A network of medical labs (<loc_depot>) dispatches refrigerated vehicles to collect blood and diagnostic samples from clinics (<loc_customer>). Each clinic specifies a time window (<time_windows>) during which samples must be picked up to maintain viability. Vehicles have limited cold-storage capacity (<capacity> liters) and must return to their origin lab within 6 hours (<duration_limit>) to preserve sample integrity. The task is to plan efficient routes that meet all time constraints, avoid exceeding storage limits, and minimize travel distance while ensuring every clinic is serviced once.
label: mdvrpltw

title: Floral Delivery Time-Window Scheduling
